statements: DELETE FROM error_correction_resources WHERE allocated_by_user = 'John Doe'
DELETE FROM quantum_devices WHERE device_name = 'Quantum Device A';
DELETE FROM error_correction_jobs WHERE job_id = 1 AND status = 'pending';
DELETE FROM quantum_devices WHERE manufacturer = 'IBM' AND total_qubits > 50;

DELETE FROM quantum_devices
WHERE manufacturer = 'IBM' AND quantum_cores > 50;
DELETE FROM quantum_devices WHERE status = 'offline' AND connectivity = false;
DELETE FROM quantum_devices WHERE device_location = 'Lab A';
DELETE FROM quantum_devices WHERE device_type = 'qubit' AND device_location = 'Laboratory A';
